org.pepstock.charba.client.options

Class MeterOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.JavaScriptObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.ChartContainer
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.EventProvider
          • org.pepstock.charba.client.options.BaseOptions
            • org.pepstock.charba.client.options.MeterOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.gwt.event.shared.EventHandler, AddHandlerEventHandler, RemoveHandlerEventHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GaugeOptions

    public class MeterOptions
extends BaseOptions
    Specific options for METER chart. This chart doesn't allow any legend, hover, layout and tooltips components.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
